meanings.definition: Not experienced in the ways of the world.
meanings.sent1: She was unworldlier than her well-traveled friends.
meanings.sent2: The unworldlier students were amazed by the bustling city life.
meanings.sent3: The unworldlier tourist mistook the local customs for a strange ritual.
meanings.sent4: His unworldlier perspective on life was like seeing the world through fresh eyes.
meanings.sent5: The unworldlier child's innocence was a refreshing change in the cynical world.

meanings.definition: Lacking knowledge or awareness of worldly matters.
meanings.sent1: The unworldlier villagers were unaware of the city's advancements.
meanings.sent2: Being unworldlier, she had trouble understanding the complex political discussions.
meanings.sent3: His unworldlier approach to investing led to some comical mistakes.
meanings.sent4: The unworldlier explorer was like a lost soul in the vast desert.
meanings.sent5: Her unworldlier view of technology made her seem out of touch with reality.
